I wish the Mediterranean Games to be instrumental in favor of mankind for the whole earth.
I wish all sportsmen, teams, and country representatives to be able to achieve it.
As Turkey, we are experiencing the excitement of hosting this organization. I congratulate everyone who has passed the test.
In this basin all colors, cultures have inspired the same sea. History of Mediterranean history of friendship.
The Mediterranean is the roof of our great family. We heartily wish that the Mediterranean will always remain open.
I hope all my athletes will succeed again. I also thank Mersinlilere. Earn sports. Get the Mediterranean.

People raise their voice against games and traps.
Your rebellion against the rebels who resorted to violence. All of Turkey's vandalism is rioting.
Here is Turkey! Here is Anatolia! The city of Kayseri Seljuk and the Ottoman, the city of the Republic!
They tell us to do these rallies as a matter of your responsibility. We fulfill our responsibilities in law.
We will not be rallying, will we watch you burn each day? It is a shame that you do not destroy it, it is sin.
The excursion park is not a group of invaders, all our people. Taksim is not a place for rallies and action. If you do, you will go to Kazlıçeşme rally.

These folks who are insulted by the pastor and the coalper are not shut up anymore.

What do we say; No way to continue. What do they say; Standing man!
Their best job is to stop them, to stop them.
These have stopped us at SSK queues, at pharmacies, on university doors, in cylinder, in bread, in sugar tails.
They could not stop the nation, but they were the ones standing themselves. We will walk with sure steps towards the goal of 2023, and we will ruin this game.
